PHRASE.LANG: Ok, a man needs one more thing to get service, but that's it. [#Legal]

Ok, a man needs one more thing to get service, but that's it. [#Legal]
好，一個男子漢需要其他玩意以找服務，而這正恰恰符合。 [#Legal]
